entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
